title: Welcome to ArkHive | Your Investigation Hub
subtitle: Getting Started with the Platform
summary: This platform is ready to document and expose institutional actions that threaten public health, safety, and civil liberties. Submit your first piece of information to begin building the archive.
content: ArkHive is designed to be a comprehensive documentation platform for investigative journalism. Each investigation you add will include detailed evidence, source documentation, and connections to the entities involved.

The platform maps relationships between government agencies, corporations, and individuals across multiple investigations, revealing patterns of institutional behavior that might otherwise remain hidden.
To add your first investigation, use the Submit form to provide information. Our team will research, verify, and document all connected entities before publishing.

title: Municipal Water Supply Contamination: A Case Study Template
subtitle: Template for Environmental Investigations
summary: This template demonstrates how environmental contamination investigations are documented, including affected populations, responsible agencies, and corporate involvement.
content: Environmental contamination investigations typically involve multiple layers of accountability. This template shows the structure for documenting such cases.
Key elements include: timeline of events, affected population statistics, regulatory failures, corporate responsibility, and long-term health impacts.
Each entity involved, from the water utility to regulatory agencies to any corporate polluters, would be linked and cross-referenced across this and related investigations.
